sequence.subtitleText: Look, I know you don’t have anything to do with this, and I can tell.
Look, I know you don’t have anything to do with this, and I can tell.
You seem like a good person who was just in the wrong place at the wrong time.
So don't worry. I’m gonna step out for a second to finish up some paperwork, and I’ll be back in a while.
So don't worry. I’m gonna step out for a second to finish up some paperwork, and I’ll be back in a while.
I just hope we can figure out this case together, so that poor girl’s parents can get some closure. I’ll see you in a bit!
I just hope we can figure out this case together, so that poor girl’s parents can get some closure. I’ll see you in a bit!
